thread.title: Little girl's sweet serenade to cancer-stricken mom goes viral
thread.title_full: Little girl's sweet serenade to cancer-stricken mom goes viral | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Allie Caren
title: Little girl's sweet serenade to cancer-stricken mom goes viral
text:
Get those tissues ready.
Watch as 4-year-old McKenna sings Martina McBride’s “I’m Gonna Love You Through It” to inspire her mother, who is currently battling cancer and was immediately brought to tears by the girl's song.
Video still via Ellen DeGeneres / Facebook >>
A video of the touching moment, which was shared Monday on Ellen DeGeneres' Facebook page , had received more than 25 million views by Thursday morning.
 watch
I love this so much… a 4-year-old girl singing to inspire her mother who's fighting cancer.
Posted by Ellen DeGeneres on Monday, October 12,
